alert.note: Alert for Erie; Hancock; Huron; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:08AM EDT until June 14 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Huron County in north central Ohio... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Southeastern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 207 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gibsonburg, or 10 miles east of Bowling Green, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Bellevue, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, New Riegel, Ballville, Pemberville, Luckey, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale and Bettsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Erie; Hancock; Huron; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood
